It was in [a pension]2585-a pension . [He]190-kreisler rented [a studio]2586-a studio as well in [the garden behind]2587-the garden behind . [The house]2588-the house was rather like [a French Public Baths]2589-a french public baths , twostoried , of a dirty purple colour . [Kreisler]190-kreisler looked up at [it]2588-the house and felt that [a very public sort of people]2590-a very public sort of people must live [there]2057-there , looking big and idle in [[their]2590-a very public sort of people rooms]2357-their rooms and constantly catching the eye of [the stranger on the pavement]2593-the stranger on the pavement . [He]190-kreisler was led to [the studio in rear of [the house]2588-the house]2594-the studio in rear of the house , and asked to wait . [He]190-kreisler turned round several long canvases and was astonished to find [dashing ladies in large hats]2596-dashing ladies in large hats before [him]190-kreisler . “[651-dear colleague] Ha ha ! Well , [I]0-i ’m damned ! Bravo , [Ernst]191-volker ! ” [he]0-i exploded in [his]0-i dull solitude , extremely amused . [Volker]191-volker had not done this in [Rome]43-rome . — Even there [he]191-volker had given indications of latent virtuosity , but had been curbed by classic presences . Since arriving in [Paris]1-paris [he]191-volker had blossomed prodigiously . [He]191-volker dealt out a vulgar vitality by the peck to [each sitter]2597-each sitter , and [they]2597-each sitter forgave [him]191-volker for making [them]2597-each sitter comparatively “[191-volker] ugly . ” [He]191-volker flung [a man]2077-a man or [woman]625-woman on to nine feet of canvas and pummelled [them]2597-each sitter on it for a couple of hours , until [they]2597-each sitter promised to remain there or were incapable of moving , so to speak . [He]191-volker had never been able to treat [people]430-people like this in any other way of life , and was grateful to painting for the experience . [He]191-volker always appeared to feel [he]191-volker would be expected to apologize for [his]191-volker brutal behaviour as [an artist]2123-an artist , and was determined not to do so . A half - hour later , on [his]191-volker return , [the servant]2602-the servant told [him]191-volker [somebody]2494-somebody was waiting in [the studio]2279-the studio . In [Paris]1-paris [Ernst Volker]191-volker had found [himself]191-volker . [It]1-paris seemed especially constructed for [him]191-volker , such [a wonderful , large , polite institution]2636-a wonderful , large , polite institution . [No one]2148-no one looked at [him]191-volker because [he]191-volker was small . For money in [Paris]1-paris represented delicate things , in [Germany]4-germany chiefly gross ones . [His]191-volker money lent [him]191-volker more stature than anything else could , and in a much more dignified and subtle way than elsewhere . [His]191-volker talent benefited for the first time by [his]191-volker money . Heavy temperament , primitive talent , had their big place , but money had at last come into its own and got into the spiritual sphere . [A very sensible and soothing spirit]2638-a very sensible and soothing spirit reigned in this seat of intelligence . [A very great number of sensible , well - dressed figures]2639-a very great number of sensible , well - dressed figures perambulated all over [these suave acres]2640-these suave acres . On the evening following [Kreisler]190-kreisler ’s arrival [Volker]191-volker had an engagement . The morning after that [Kreisler]190-kreisler turned up at half - past twelve . [Volker]191-volker was painting [Fraulein Bodenaar]192-fraulein bodenaar . [She]2646-she was very smartly dressed , in a tight German way . [Kreisler]190-kreisler the night before had spent a good deal of money in [the German paradise beyond [the river]2270-the river]2649-the german paradise beyond the river . [Volker]191-volker understood by the particular insistent blankness of [Kreisler]190-kreisler ’s eye that money was needed . [He]191-volker was familiar with this look . [Kreisler]190-kreisler owed [him]191-volker fifteen hundred marks . [Kreisler]190-kreisler had felt keenly the financial void caused by [Volker]191-volker ’s going off to [Paris]1-paris . [He]190-kreisler was in a luxurious hurry to see once more the colour of [Volker]191-volker ’s gold . [Kreisler]190-kreisler was very touchy about money , like [many borrowers]2654-many borrowers . [He]0-i did not get on well with [Soltyk]205-soltyk . [He]190-kreisler even paid several debts that it was quite unnecessary to pay , in a moment of panic and weakness . A straitened week ensued . At [the Berne]2321-the berne [he]190-kreisler had lost [his]190-kreisler nerve in some way ; [he]190-kreisler clowned obsequiously on some evenings , and , depressed and slack the next , perhaps , resented [[his]190-kreisler companions]2707-his companions ’ encores . [People]430-people feel with [the “[190-kreisler] lonely ” man]2715-the “ lonely ” man that [he]190-kreisler is going about with [some eccentric companion]2716-some eccentric companion — that is [himself]190-kreisler . [He]190-kreisler is ludicrous as [two men]2718-two men would be who , perpetually in [each other ’s company]2719-each other ’s company , were never seen to exchange a word — who dined together , went to theatre or café , without ever looking at [each other or speaking]2720-each other or speaking . So [Kreisler]190-kreisler became [a lonely figure]2721-a lonely figure . It was a strange feeling . [He]190-kreisler must be quiet and not attract attention . [He]190-kreisler . was marked in some way as though [he]190-kreisler had committed a theft . Perhaps it was merely the worry of perpetual “[190-kreisler] tick ” beginning to tell . [The Restaurant Lejeune]2773-the restaurant lejeune , like many others in [Paris]1-paris , had been originally [a clean , tranquil little creamery , consisting of [a small shop a few feet either way]2775-a small shop a few feet either way]2774-a clean , tranquil little creamery , consisting of a small shop a few feet either way . — Then [one customer]2776-one customer after another had become more gluttonous . [He]190-kreisler seemed making up [his]190-kreisler mind . “[698-i---] Monsieur est distrait aujourd’hui , ” [Jeanne]213-jeanne said , who was waiting to take [his]190-kreisler order . Contrary to custom , [he]190-kreisler sought for some appetizing dish , to change the routine . [Appetite]214-appetite had not woken , but [he]190-kreisler had become restless before the usual dull programme . There were certain tracts of menu [he]190-kreisler never explored . [His]190-kreisler eye always guided [him]190-kreisler at once to the familiar place where [the “[213-jeanne] plat du jour ” was to be found]2805-the “ plat du jour ” was to be found , and the alternative sweets heading the list . This awakening to beauties of the menu brought with it a survey of [[his]190-kreisler neighbour]2806-his neighbour . Vaguely , [she]213-jeanne must be connected with lobster salad . How could that be ? First [he]190-kreisler was surprised that [such a beautiful girl]2807-such a beautiful girl should be sitting there . [Beautiful people]2808-beautiful people wander dangerously about in life , just like [ordinary folk]2809-ordinary folk . [He]190-kreisler appeared to think that [they]2808-beautiful people should be isolated like [powder magazines]2810-powder magazines or [lepers]2811-lepers . [This man]416-this man could never leave good luck alone , or reflect that that , too , was [a dangerous vagrant]2813-a dangerous vagrant . [He]190-kreisler could not quite grasp that it was a general good luck and easily explained phenomenon . [He]190-kreisler had already been examined by [the beautiful girl]2814-the beautiful girl . Throwing an absent far - away look into [her]2814-the beautiful girl eyes , [she]2814-the beautiful girl let them wander over [him]190-kreisler . Afterwards [she]2814-the beautiful girl cast them down into [her]2814-the beautiful girl soup . As [a pickpocket]2815-a pickpocket , after brisk work in [a crowd]433-a crowd , hurries [home]2396-home to examine and evaluate [his]190-kreisler spoil , so [she]2814-the beautiful girl then examined collectedly what [her]2814-the beautiful girl dreamy eyes had noted . This method was not characteristic of [her]2814-the beautiful girl , but of the category of useful habits bequeathed [us]2818-us , each sex having its own . Perhaps in [her]2814-the beautiful girl cloudy soup [she]2814-the beautiful girl beheld something of the storm and shock that inhabited [[her]2814-the beautiful girl neighbour]2325-her neighbour . Without preliminary reflection [Kreisler]190-kreisler found [himself]190-kreisler addressing [her]2814-the beautiful girl , a little abashed when [he]190-kreisler suddenly heard [his]190-kreisler voice , and with eerie feeling when it was answered . “[213-jeanne] From [your]699-he hesitation in choosing [your]699-he lunch , gnadiges Fraulein , [I]0-i suppose [you]699-he have not been long in [Paris]1-paris ? ” “[699-he] No , [I]0-i only arrived a week ago , from [America]3-america . ” [She]2814-the beautiful girl settled [her]2814-the beautiful girl elbows on the table for a moment . “[0-i] Allow [me]0-i to give [you]699-he some idea of what the menu of [this restaurant]700-this restaurant is like . ” This was like a lesson . [He]699-he started ponderously . “[0-i] At the head of each list [you]699-he will find simple dishes ; elemental dishes , [I]0-i might call them ! ( Elementalische platter ! ) This is the rough material from which the others are evolved . Each list is like an oriental dance . It gets wilder as it goes along . In the last dish [you]699-he can be sure that the potatoes will taste like tomatoes , and the pork like a sirloin of beef . ” “[699-he] So ! ” laughed [the young woman]2820-the young woman , with good German gutteral . “[0-i] [I]0-i ’m glad to say [I]0-i have ordered dishes that head the list . ” “[215-garlic] [Garlic]215-garlic is [an enemy usually ambushed in [gigot]51-gigot]701-an enemy usually ambushed in gigot . — That is [his]702-his only quite certain haunt . ” “[702-his] Good ; [I]0-i will avoid gigot . ” [She]2814-the beautiful girl was indulgent to [his]699-he clowning , and drawled a little in sympathy . Between language and feeding , [Kreisler]190-kreisler sought to gain [the young lady]2821-the young lady ’s confidence , adhering conventionally to the progress of Creation . [He]699-he found [[his]699-he neighbour]2806-his neighbour inclined to slight Nature . [He]699-he , too , was a little overlooked ; in waiving of conventions being blandly forestalled . There was something uncomfortable about all this . [He]699-he must brace [himself]699-he [He]699-he realized with the prophetic logic of [his]699-he hysteria , racing through the syllogisms [his]699-he senses divined , sensations now anachronisms , afterwards recognized as they burst out in due course . This precocity in [the restaurant]2772-the restaurant took [him]699-he to the solution of what [their]2824-their coming together might mean . One plethoric impression of [her]2814-the beautiful girl was received — although from [her]2814-the beautiful girl — instalment of a senseless generosity . [She]2814-the beautiful girl wore a heavy black burnous , very voluminous and severe ; a large ornamental bag was on the chair at [her]2814-the beautiful girl side , which [you]2825-you expected to contain herbs and trinkets , paraphernalia of [the witch]2826-the witch , rather than powder , lip - cream , and secrets . [Her]2814-the beautiful girl hat was immense and sinuous ; generally [she]2814-the beautiful girl implied an egotistic code of advanced order , full of insolent strategies . [Other women in [the restaurant]2772-the restaurant]2827-other women in the restaurant appeared dragged down and drained of vitality by [their]2827-other women in the restaurant clothes beside [her]2814-the beautiful girl , [Kreisler]190-kreisler thought , although [she]2814-the beautiful girl wore so much more than [they]2827-other women in the restaurant did . [Her]2814-the beautiful girl large square - shouldered and slim body swam in [hers]2814-the beautiful girl like a duck . When [she]2814-the beautiful girl laughed , this commotion was transmitted to [her]2814-the beautiful girl body as though sharp , sonorous blows had been struck on [her]2814-the beautiful girl mouth . [Her]2814-the beautiful girl lips were long , hard bubbles risen in the blond heavy pool of [her]2814-the beautiful girl face , ready to break , pitifully and gaily . Grown forward with ape - like intensity , [they]2827-other women in the restaurant refused no emotion noisy egress if it got so far . [Her]2814-the beautiful girl eyes were , large , stubborn , and reflective , brown coming out of blondness . [Her]2814-the beautiful girl head was like a deep white egg in a tobacco - coloured nest . [She]2814-the beautiful girl exuded personality with alarming and disgusting intensity . It was an ostentation similar to diamonds and gold watch - chains . [Kreisler]190-kreisler felt [himself]190-kreisler in the midst of a cascade , a hot cascade . [She]2814-the beautiful girl seemed to feel [herself]2814-the beautiful girl a travelling circus of tricks and wonders , beauty shows and monstrosities . Quite used to being looked at , [she]2814-the beautiful girl had become resigned to inability to avoid performing . [She]2814-the beautiful girl possessed the geniality of public character and the genius of sex . [Kreisler]190-kreisler was [a strange loafer]2829-a strange loafer talked to easily , without any consciousness of condescension . Just as [he]190-kreisler was most out of [his]190-kreisler depth , [Kreisler]190-kreisler had run up against all this ! It all had the mellowness of sunset , and boomed in this small alcove infernally . — By the fact of sex this figure seems to offer [him]190-kreisler a traditional substantiality . [He]190-kreisler clutches at it eagerly as at something familiar and unmetamorphosed — and somewhat unmetamorphosable — by [Fate]172-fate . [He]706-he can declaim , be outrageous to the top of [his]706-he bent ; can be maudlin too ; all conducted almost as [he]706-he pleases , with none of the shocks of the real and too tragic world . In this manner [woman]625-woman was the aesthetic element in [Kreisler]190-kreisler ’s life . Love , too , always meant unhappy love for [him]706-he , with its misunderstandings and wistful separations . [He]706-he issued forth solemnly and the better for it . [A casual observer of the progress of [Otto Kreisler]190-kreisler ’s life]2851-a casual observer of the progress of otto kreisler ’s life might have said that the chief events , the crises , consisted of [his]706-he love affairs — such as that unfortunate one with [[his]706-he present stepmother]2852-his present stepmother . — But , in the light of a careful analysis , this would have been an inversion of the truth . This account , to be brought up to date , must be modified . Since knowing [Volker]191-volker , [no woman]2861-no woman had come conspicuously to disturb [him]191-volker . But between this state — the minimum degree of friendship possible — a distant and soothing companionship — and more serious states , there was no possible foothold for [Kreisler]190-kreisler . Friendship usually dates from unformed years . But Love still remains in full swing long after [Kreisler]190-kreisler ’s age at that time ; a sort of spurious and intense friendship . An uncomfortable thing happened now . [He]706-he realized suddenly all the possibilities of this chance acquaintanceship , plainly and cinematographically . — [He]706-he was seized with panic . — [He]706-he must make a good impression . — From that moment [he]706-he ran the risk of doing the reverse . For [he]706-he was unaccustomed to act with calculation . — There [he]706-he was like [some individual who had gone nonchalantly into the presence of [a prince]2863-a prince ; who — just in the middle of [the audience]2864-the audience — when [he]706-he would have been getting over [his]706-he first ’ embarrassment]2862-some individual who had gone nonchalantly into the presence of a prince ; who — just in the middle of the audience — when he would have been getting over his first ’ embarrassment — is overcome with a tardy confusion , the imagination in some way giving a jump . Anyway , [he]706-he grasped at the dog . [He]706-he could regain possession of [himself]706-he in romantic stimulus of this figure . [He]706-he would be [[her]2865-her dog]2866-her dog ! Lie at [her]2865-her feet ! [He]706-he would fill with a merely animal warmth and vivacity the void that must exist in [her]2865-her spirit . [His]706-he imagination , flattered , came in as ally . This , too , exempted [him]706-he from the necessity of being victorious . All [he]706-he asked was to be [her]2865-her dog ! — only wished to impress [her]2865-her as a dog ! Even if [she]2865-her did not feel much sympathy for [him]706-he now , no matter . — [He]706-he would humbly follow [her]2865-her up , put [himself]706-he at [her]2865-her disposal , not be exigent . It was Saturday when [Kreisler]190-kreisler was found preparing to take [his]190-kreisler valise to [the Mont de Piété]2521-the mont de piété . On the preceding evening [he]190-kreisler had paid one of [his]190-kreisler unaccountable calls on [Fraulein Lipmann]209-fraulein lipmann , the first for some time . [He]190-kreisler had a good reason for once . [This salon]2897-this salon was [the only place of comparatively public assembly in [the quarter]2893-the quarter [he]190-kreisler had not visited]2898-the only place of comparatively public assembly in the quarter he had not visited . Entering with [his]190-kreisler usual slight air of mystification , [he]190-kreisler bent to kiss [Fraulein Lipmann]209-fraulein lipmann ’s hand in a vaguely significant fashion . The blank reciprocal indifference of these calls was thus relieved . It awoke a vague curiosity on one side , a little playful satisfaction on the other . This might even have ripened into a sort of understanding and bonhomie . [He]190-kreisler did not pursue it or develop the role . After a half - hour of musing on the brink of a stream of conversation and then music , [he]190-kreisler suddenly recognized something , flotsam bobbing past . It had bobbed past before several times . [He]190-kreisler gradually became steadily aware of it . A dance at [the Bonnington Club]2900-the bonnington club , that would take place the following evening , was the event that arrested [him]190-kreisler . Why was this familiar ? [Anastasya]216-anastasya ? [Anastasya]216-anastasya had spoken of it . That was all [he]190-kreisler could remember . Would [she]209-fraulein lipmann be [there]2057-there ? [He]190-kreisler at once , and as though [he]190-kreisler had come [there]2057-there to do so , fished delicately in this same stream of tepid , chatter for an invitation to the dance . [Fraulein Lipmann]209-fraulein lipmann , the fish [he]190-kreisler particularly angled , for , was backward . [They]2903-they did not seem to want [him]190-kreisler very much at the dance . Nevertheless , after an hour of indefatigable manoeuvring , the exertion of many powers seldom put forth in [that salon]2904-that salon , [he]190-kreisler secured the form , not the spirit , of an invitation . [Kreisler]190-kreisler saw , in [his]190-kreisler alarmed fancy , [Anastasya]216-anastasya becoming welded into [this gregarious female personality]2697-this gregarious female personality . The energy and resource of [the Devil]2906-the devil [himself]190-kreisler would be required to extricate [her]209-fraulein lipmann . [She]209-fraulein lipmann must be held back from [this slough]2907-this slough for the moment [he]190-kreisler needed . Was it too late to intercept [her]209-fraulein lipmann ? But [he]190-kreisler felt [he]190-kreisler might do it . The eyes of [these ladies]2685-these ladies , so far dull with indifference , would open . [He]190-kreisler would be seen as [a being with a new mysterious function]2909-a being with a new mysterious function . [He]190-kreisler felt that [Volker]191-volker ’s absence from [their]2685-these ladies reunions was due to [his]191-volker not wishing to meet [him]190-kreisler . [They]2685-these ladies , too , must see that . Now the enigmatical and silent doggedness of these visits would seem explained . [He]190-kreisler would appear like [some unwieldy , deliberate parasite]2910-some unwieldy , deliberate parasite got on to [their]2685-these ladies indivisible body . The invitation given , [he]190-kreisler made haste to go . If [he]190-kreisler stayed much longer it would be overlaid with all sorts of offensive and effacing matter , and be hardly fit for use . A defiant and jeering look on [his]190-kreisler face , [he]190-kreisler withdrew with an “[190-kreisler] Until to - morrow . ” It was at this point that [the “[190-kreisler] smokkin ”]2911-the “ smokkin ” came into prominence . “[190-kreisler] Impossible , [[my]0-i poor [Kreisler]190-kreisler]726-my poor kreisler ! Five francs . No more ! ” [Suzanne]186-suzanne stood at attention before [him]190-kreisler in [the hall of [the Mont de Pi&A.]2913-the mont de pi&a.]2912-the hall of the mont de pi&a. If [she]186-suzanne had been inexorable before , [she]186-suzanne was now doubly so beneath the eyes of [the veritable officials]2914-the veritable officials . The sight of [them]2685-these ladies , and the half - official status of [go - between]2915-go - between and [interpreter]2916-interpreter , urged [her]186-suzanne to ape - like importance . With flushed and angry face , raised eyebrows , shocked at [his]190-kreisler questioning the verdict , [she]186-suzanne repeated , “[0-i] Five francs ; it ’s the most . ” “[0-i] No , that ’s no good ; give [me]0-i the portmanteau , ” [he]190-kreisler said . [She]186-suzanne gave it [him]190-kreisler in silence , eyebrows still raised , eyes fixed , staring with intelligent disapproval right in front of [her]186-suzanne . [She]186-suzanne did not look at [[her]186-suzanne eminent countrymen]2917-her eminent countrymen behind the large counter . But [her]186-suzanne intelligent and significant stare , lost in space , was meant to meet and fraternize with probable similar stares of [theirs]2918-theirs , lost in the same intelligent void . [Her]186-suzanne face fixed in distended , rubicund , discontentedly resigned mask , [she]186-suzanne walked on beside [him]190-kreisler , the turkey - like backward - forward motion of fat neck marking [her]186-suzanne ruffled state . [Kreisler]190-kreisler sat down on [a bench of [the Boulevard du Paradis]378-the boulevard du paradis]2919-a bench of the boulevard du paradis , [she]186-suzanne beside [him]190-kreisler . “[0-i] Dis ! could n’t [you]0-i have borrowed the rest ? ” [she]186-suzanne said at last . [Kreisler]190-kreisler was tired . [He]190-kreisler got up . “[0-i] No , of course [I]0-i could n’t . [I]0-i hate people who lend money as [I]0-i hate [pawnbrokers]727-pawnbrokers . ” ' [Suzanne]186-suzanne listened , with protesting grin . [I]0-i do n’t know . [He]219-volker has no money . ” “[219-volker] Comment ! Il n’a pas d’argent ? C’est pas vrai ! Tu ne le vois p’us ? ” “[219-volker] Good - bye . ” [Kreisler]190-kreisler left [Suzanne]186-suzanne seated , staring after [him]190-kreisler . [The portmanteau]2921-the portmanteau dragged along , [he]190-kreisler strode past [a distant figure]2922-a distant figure . [Suzanne]186-suzanne saw [him]190-kreisler turn round and examine [the stranger]2923-the stranger ’s face . Then [she]186-suzanne lost sight of [them]2924-them round a corner of [the boulevard]426-the boulevard . “[219-volker] Quel type ! ” [she]186-suzanne exclaimed to [herself]186-suzanne , nearly as [the concierge]2561-the concierge had done . [She]186-suzanne sauntered back [home]2396-home , giving [Kreisler]190-kreisler the benefit of several sour reflections . In [a little room]2928-a little room situated behind [the Rue de la Gaïté]2929-the rue de la gaïté , [she]186-suzanne pulled open one of two drawers in [[her]186-suzanne washstand]2930-her washstand , which contained a little bread , tea , potatoes , and a piece of cold fish . [She]186-suzanne spread out a sheet of the Petit Parisien beside the basin . Having peeled the potatoes and put them on the gas , [she]186-suzanne took off those outdoor things that just enabled [her]186-suzanne to impart a turkey - like movement to [[her]186-suzanne person]2931-her person . Then , dumpy , in a salmon - check petticoat , [her]186-suzanne legs bowed backwards and [her]186-suzanne stomach stuck out , [she]186-suzanne stood moodily at the window . [A man [she]186-suzanne knew , now in [the Midi]2933-the midi]2932-a man she knew , now in the midi , sent [her]186-suzanne now and then a few francs . [This rueful spot]2934-this rueful spot , struck in image of [this elementary dross of humanity]2935-this elementary dross of humanity , was [[Kreisler]190-kreisler ’s occasional haunt]2936-kreisler ’s occasional haunt . Cell of [the unwieldy , tragic brain of [the city]2938-the city]2937-the unwieldy , tragic brain of the city , with million other similar cells , representing overwhelming uniform force of brooding in that brain , attracted [him]190-kreisler like [a desert]2939-a desert or [ocean]2940-ocean . [He]190-kreisler would listen solemnly , like [a great judge]2941-a great judge , to [Suzanne]186-suzanne ’s perpetual complaints , sitting on the edge of [her]186-suzanne bed , hat on head . [She]186-suzanne was so humble and so pretentious . [Her]186-suzanne imagination was arrogant and constantly complaining . The form [her]186-suzanne complaints took was always that of lies — needless , dismal lies . [She]186-suzanne could not grumble without inventing and [she]186-suzanne never stopped grumbling . This , then , was one of [[Kreisler]190-kreisler ’s dwellings]2942-kreisler ’s dwellings . [He]190-kreisler lived at large . [Some of [[his]190-kreisler rooms]2756-his rooms]2943-some of his rooms , such as this , [the Cafe de Berne]52-the cafe de berne , and [[Juan Soler]220-juan soler ’s School of Art]2945-juan soler ’s school of art , [he]190-kreisler shared with [others]2141-others . On very troubled days [his]190-kreisler body , like the finger of a weather - glass , would move erratically . When found in [[Suzanne]186-suzanne ’s room]2947-suzanne ’s room it might be taken as an indication of an unsettled state . A tendency to remain at [home]2396-home , on the contrary , denoted mostly a state of equilibrium and peace . CHAPTER VIII [The portmanteau]2921-the portmanteau fell under the bed ; [he]190-kreisler crushed into the red bulbous cover . [Kreisler]190-kreisler never sat on [his]190-kreisler bed except when going to get into [it]2947-suzanne ’s room . For [another man]2151-another man it would have replaced the absent armchair . In those moments of depression in which [he]190-kreisler did so [he]190-kreisler always , at once , felt more depressed , or quite hopeless . Head between hands , [he]190-kreisler now stared at the floor . Four or five hours ! [He]190-kreisler must raise money , else [he]190-kreisler could not go to the dance . How absurd , this fuss about such a sum ! All the same , how the devil could [he]190-kreisler get it ? “[219-volker] Small as it is , [I]0-i sha n’t get it , ” [he]190-kreisler thought to [himself]190-kreisler . [He]190-kreisler began repeating this stupidly , and stuck at word “[0-i] sha n’t . ” [His]190-kreisler brain and mouth clogged up , [he]190-kreisler stuttered thickly in [his]190-kreisler mind . [He]190-kreisler sprang up . But the slovenly , hopeless quality of the bed clung to [him]190-kreisler . This was a frivolous demonstration . [He]190-kreisler wandered to the window ; stood staring out , nose flattened against the pane . The sudden quiet and idleness of [his]190-kreisler personality was an awakening after the little nightmare of [Suzanne]186-suzanne . But it was not a refreshing one . [His]190-kreisler portmanteau had always received certain consideration , as being , next the dress - suit , the most dependable article among [those beneath [his]190-kreisler sway]2951-those beneath his sway — to come to [his]190-kreisler aid if [their]2951-those beneath his sway common existence were threatened . [He]190-kreisler had now thrown it under the bed with disgust . [He]190-kreisler and all [his]190-kreisler goods were rubbish for [the streets]2436-the streets . [He]190-kreisler sauntered from the window to the bed and back . Whenever [he]190-kreisler liked , in a sense , [he]190-kreisler would open the door and go out ; but still , until then ( and when would [he]190-kreisler “[0-i] like ” ? ) [he]190-kreisler was [a poor prisoner]2953-a poor prisoner . Outside , [he]190-kreisler took some strength and importance from [others]2141-others . In here [he]190-kreisler touched bottom and realized what the Kreisler - self was , with four walls round it . [His]190-kreisler muscles were still full . They symbolized [his]190-kreisler uselessness . The thought , so harsh and tyrannical , of [his]190-kreisler once more going to the window and gazing down at [the street beneath]2955-the street beneath made [him]190-kreisler draw back [his]190-kreisler chair . [He]190-kreisler sat midway in [the room]2366-the room , looking steadily out at [the housetops]2957-the housetops . But , like [his]190-kreisler vigorous muscles and [his]190-kreisler deadness , there was the same contradiction ; [his]190-kreisler mechanical obstinacy as regards [Anastasya]216-anastasya and [his]190-kreisler comic activity at present to get to a dance . [Comrades at painting school]2958-comrades at painting school , [nodding acquaintances]2959-nodding acquaintances , etc . , were once more run through . [None]221-none valued [his]190-kreisler acquaintance at more than thirty centimes , if that . Perhaps [Anastasya]216-anastasya had left [Paris]1-paris ? This solution , occurring sometimes , had only made [his]190-kreisler activity during the last few days more mad and mechanical — the pursuit of a shadow . Ten minutes later , through a series of difficult clockwork - like actions , [he]190-kreisler had got once more to [Lejeune]222-lejeune ’s to have lunch . With disgust [he]190-kreisler took what had been [his]190-kreisler usual seat latterly , at the table in [the recess]2960-the recess ; the one place , [he]190-kreisler was sure , [Anastasya]216-anastasya would never be found in again , wherever else [she]2961-she might be found . Lunch nearly over , [he]190-kreisler caught sight of [Lowndes]154-lowndes . “[2963-master ” lowndes] Hi , [Master Lowndes]223-lowndes ! ” [he]190-kreisler called out — always assuming great bluffness and brutality , as [he]190-kreisler called it , with [English people]2962-english people , and laborious opposite to “[223-lowndes] stiffness . ” “[2963-master ” lowndes] How do [you]223-lowndes do ? ” The moment [his]190-kreisler eye had fallen on “[2963-master ” lowndes] [Master ” Lowndes]2963-master ” lowndes [this friend]2964-this friend ’s probable national opulence had occurred to [him]190-kreisler as a tantalizing fact . No gross decision could be come to in that moment . [Lowndes]223-lowndes was called to be kept there a little bit , while [he]190-kreisler turned things over and made up [his]190-kreisler mind . This was an acquaintance existing chiefly on chaff and national antithesis . It meant nothing to [him]190-kreisler . What matter if [he]190-kreisler were refused ? [Lowndes]223-lowndes not being [a compatriot]2965-a compatriot made it easier . Something must be sacrificed . [Lowndes]223-lowndes ’ acquaintanceship was a possession something equivalent to a cheap ring , a souvenir . [He]223-lowndes must part with it , if necessary . [Lowndes]223-lowndes grinned at sight of [Kreisler]190-kreisler . [He]223-lowndes had finished [his]223-lowndes own lunch and was just going off . [He]223-lowndes had almost forgotten [his]223-lowndes idea in coming to [the restaurant]2772-the restaurant , that of seeing [[his]223-lowndes German acquaintance]2967-his german acquaintance . [[My]0-i father]639-my father has offered [me]0-i a position ! ” This subject seemed no more important than [his]0-i speech made it , and yet it filled [his]0-i life . [Lowndes]223-lowndes smiled correctly , not suspecting realities . “[639-my father] Have [you]728-you seen [Douglas]224-douglas ? ” This was [a friend through whom [they]2969-they had known each other in [Italy]42-italy]2970-a friend through whom they had known each other in italy . Why should [this fellow]2971-this fellow lend [him]0-i thirty francs ? The grin would not be there , [he]0-i felt , had [he]0-i been conscious that [the other]2449-the other was thinking of the contents of [his]0-i pocket . Not humour , but a much colder stuff no doubt mounted guard over [his]0-i pocket - book , guarantee of this easiness and health . Oh , the offensive prosperity of [the English]2973-the english , smugness of middle - class affluence ! etc . etc . [Kreisler]190-kreisler imagined the change that would come over this face when there was question of thirty francs . Estrangement set in on [his]0-i side already , anger and humiliation at the imagined expression . This was of help . Here was [his]0-i chance of borrowing that very insignificant but illusive sum . [The man]2084-the man was already [an enemy]2975-an enemy . [He]190-kreisler would willingly have knocked [him]2084-the man on the head and taken [his]2084-the man money had [they]2969-they been in [a quiet place]2976-a quiet place . [His]190-kreisler relations with [him]2084-the man hinging on mild racial differences , [he]190-kreisler saw behind [him]190-kreisler the long line of [all the Englishmen [he]190-kreisler had ever known]2977-all the englishmen he had ever known . “[224-douglas] [Useless swine]731-useless swine , ” [he]190-kreisler thought , “[731-useless swine] so pleased with [his]731-useless swine cursed English face , and mean as [a peasant]2233-a peasant ! ” “[2233-a peasant] Oh , [I]0-i was asked for [my]0-i opinion on a certain matter this morning . [You]0-i see ? Up there . ” “[0-i] [I]0-i will . [The old address]2978-the old address reminded [him]190-kreisler of several little debts [there]2057-there . For this reason [he]190-kreisler had not told [them]743-they where [he]190-kreisler was going . [The concierge]2561-the concierge would complain of [[her]2561-the concierge old tenant]2981-her old tenant ; probably , even , [Lowndes]223-lowndes might have been shown derelict [tradesmen]2982-tradesmen ’s bills . [Lowndes]223-lowndes was writing on a piece of paper . “[0-i] There ’s [my]0-i address : [Rue des Flammes]54-rue des flammes . ” [Kreisler]190-kreisler looked at it rather fussily and said over : “[0-i] 5 [Rue des Flammes]54-rue des flammes . [Lowndes]223-lowndes . ” [He]190-kreisler hesitated and repeated the name . “[223-lowndes] [R. W.]226-r. w. — [Robert Wooton]227-robert wooton . On the way [Lowndes]223-lowndes continued a discourse . “[744-a novelist i knew] [A novelist [I]0-i knew]744-a novelist i knew told [me]0-i [he]744-a novelist i knew changed the names of the characters in a book several times in the course of writing it . It freshened [them]745-them up , according to [him]744-a novelist i knew . [He]744-a novelist i knew said that [the majority of [people]430-people]746-the majority of people were killed by [their]746-the majority of people names . [I]0-i think a name is [a man]2077-a man ’s soul . ” [Kreisler]190-kreisler forged ahead , rhythmically and sullenly . “[2077-a man] If [we]749-we had numbers , for instance , instead of names , who would take the number thirteen ? ” [Lowndes]223-lowndes wondered in German . “[0-i] [I]0-i , ” said [Kreisler]190-kreisler . “[0-i] Would [you]0-i ? ” Every minute [Kreisler]190-kreisler delayed increased the difficulty . [His]190-kreisler energy was giving out . [They]749-we were now sitting on the terrasse at [the Berne]9-the berne . [He]190-kreisler had developed a particular antipathy to borrowing . [An immense personal neurasthenia]2984-an immense personal neurasthenia had grown up round this habit of [his]190-kreisler , owing to [his]190-kreisler late discomfitures . [He]190-kreisler already heard an awkward voice , saw awkward eyes . Then [he]190-kreisler suddenly concluded that the fact that [Lowndes]223-lowndes was [not a German]2985-not a german made it more difficult , instead of less§ so , as [he]190-kreisler had thought . Why could [he]190-kreisler not take ? — why petition ? [He]190-kreisler knew that if [Lowndes]223-lowndes refused [he]190-kreisler would break out ; [he]190-kreisler nearly did so as it was . With disgust and fatigue [he]190-kreisler lay back in [his]190-kreisler chair , paying no attention to what [Lowndes]223-lowndes was saying . [His]190-kreisler mind was made up . [He]190-kreisler would not proceed with [his]190-kreisler designs on this dirty pocket . [He]190-kreisler became rough and monosyllabic . [He]190-kreisler wished to purify [himself]190-kreisler in rudeness of [his]190-kreisler preceding amiability . [Lowndes]223-lowndes had been looking at a newspaper . [He]223-lowndes put it down and said [he]223-lowndes must go back to “[0-i] work . ” [His]223-lowndes “[0-i] morning ” had , of course , been interrupted by [Tarr]122-tarr ! [Kreisler]190-kreisler still saw the expression on [the Englishman]2986-the englishman ’s face [he]190-kreisler had imagined , and restrained with difficulty the desire to spit in it . The nearness [they]2987-they had been to this demand must have affected , [he]190-kreisler thought , even [[his]190-kreisler impervious companion]2988-his impervious companion . [He]190-kreisler had asked and been refused , to all intents and purposes . [He]190-kreisler got up , left [Lowndes]223-lowndes standing there , and went into the lavatory at the side of [the cafe]2705-the cafe , where [he]190-kreisler had a thorough wash in cold water . Back at [his]190-kreisler table , [he]190-kreisler saw no sign of [the Englishman]2986-the englishman , and sat down to finish [his]190-kreisler drink , considering what [his]190-kreisler next move should be . Various pursuits suggested [themselves]2987-they . [He]190-kreisler might go and offer [himself]190-kreisler as model at [some big private studios near [the Observatoire]2992-the observatoire]2991-some big private studios near the observatoire . [He]190-kreisler could get a week ’s money advanced [him]190-kreisler ? [He]190-kreisler would dress as [a woman]2139-a woman and waylay [somebody]2494-somebody or other on [the boulevards]2995-the boulevards . [He]190-kreisler might steal some money . [Volker]219-volker was the last . [He]219-volker came just after murder . [He]219-volker would go to [Ernst Volker]191-volker — [he]219-volker with [his]219-volker little obstinate resolve in obscurity of [his]219-volker mind no longer to be [[Kreisler]190-kreisler ’s acquaintance]2996-kreisler ’s acquaintance . Obstinacy in [people of weak character]2997-people of weak character is the perfectly exasperating thing . [They]2997-people of weak character have no right to [their]2997-people of weak character resoluteness — appearing weaker and meaner than ever in anomalous tenacity . [Volker]191-volker , naturally submissive , had broken away and was posing somewhere as [a stranger]509-a stranger . [He]191-volker .felt physical disgust ; this proceeding was indecent . A spirit that has mingled with another , suddenly covering itself and wishing to regain its strangeness , can be as indecent as a strange being suddenly baring itself . [A man]2077-a man ’s being is never divined so completely and pungently as when [his]2077-a man friendship cools and [he]2077-a man becomes once more [a stranger]509-a stranger . This is one of the moments when the imagination , most awake , sees best . [This little rat]3001-this little rat ’s instinctive haste to separate from [him]2077-a man was an ill omen : what did [he]2077-a man care for omens ? [he]2077-a man clamoured impatiently . At this juncture in [his]2077-a man reflections , from where [he]2077-a man sat on [the café terrace]3002-the café terrace [he]2077-a man saw [Volker]191-volker ’s back , as [he]2077-a man supposed , disappearing round a corner , as though trying to avoid a meeting . Blood came to [his]2077-a man head with a shock . [He]2077-a man nearly sprang forward in pursuit of this unsociable form . Rushing words of insult rose to [his]2077-a man lips , [he]2077-a man fidgeted on [his]2077-a man seat , gazed blankly at the spot where [he]2077-a man had seen the figure . That it was no longer there exasperated [him]2077-a man beyond measure . It was as though [he]2077-a man considered that [Ernst]191-volker should have remained at the corner , immobile , with [his]191-volker back towards [him]191-volker , a visible mark and fuel for anger . [He]2077-a man made a sign to [the waiter]3003-the waiter , indicating that [his]2077-a man drink would go into [his]2077-a man “[228-hallo] tick . ” [He]2077-a man then hurried off in the direction of [[Volker]191-volker ’s house]3004-volker ’s house — the direction also that the back had taken — determined to get something out of [him]191-volker . [Kreisler]190-kreisler , letting instinct guide [his]190-kreisler steps , took the wrong turning — following , in fact , [his]190-kreisler customary morning ’s itinerary . [He]190-kreisler found [himself]190-kreisler suddenly far beyond [the street [Volker]191-volker lived in]3005-the street volker lived in , near [[Juan Soler]220-juan soler ’s atelier]3006-juan soler ’s atelier . [He]190-kreisler gazed down [the street]2061-the street towards [the atelier]3008-the atelier , then took off [his]190-kreisler glasses and began carefully wiping them . While doing this [he]190-kreisler heard words of greeting and found [Volker]191-volker at [his]190-kreisler elbow . “[228-hallo] [Hallo]228-hallo ! [You]228-hallo look pretty hot . [You]228-hallo nearly knocked [me]0-i over a minute ago in [your]228-hallo haste , ” [he]0-i was saying . [Kreisler]190-kreisler jumped — as [the bravest]3009-the bravest might if , having stoutly confronted [an apparition]3010-an apparition , it suddenly became [a man of flesh and blood]3011-a man of flesh and blood . Had [his]190-kreisler glasses been firmly planted on [his]190-kreisler nose things might have gone differently . [He]190-kreisler frowned vacantly at [Ernst]191-volker and went on rubbing them . [Volker]191-volker saw that something was wrong . It would have been to [his]191-volker advantage also to “[228-hallo] have out ” anything that was there and have done with it . But in [his]191-volker attitude German sluggishness seemed appealing to the same element in [Kreisler]190-kreisler ’s nature , claiming its support and sympathy . “[228-hallo] It ’s dreadfully hot ! ” [he]190-kreisler said uneasily , looking round as though examining the heat . [He]190-kreisler stepped up on to [the pavement]3012-the pavement out of the way of [a horse - meat cart]3013-a horse - meat cart . The large - panelled conveyance , full of enormous outlandish red carcases , went rushing down [the street]2061-the street , carrying an area of twenty yards of deafness with it . This explosion of sound had a pacifying effect on [Kreisler]190-kreisler ; it made [him]190-kreisler smile for some reason or other . [Volker]191-volker went on : “[0-i] [I]0-i do n’t know whether [I]0-i told [you]0-i about [my]0-i show . ” “[0-i] What show ? ” [Kreisler]190-kreisler asked rudely . “[0-i] In [Berlin]29-berlin , [you]0-i know . It has not gone badly . [[Our]750-our compatriots]751-our compatriots improve . [I]0-i ’ve got a commission to paint the [Countess Wort]229-countess wort . What have [you]0-i been doing lately ? ” There was a forbidding pause . “[0-i] [I]0-i ’ve intended coming round to see [you]0-i ; but [I]0-i ’ve been sticking at [home]2396-home working . Have [you]0-i been round at [the Berne]9-the berne ? ” [He]0-i spoke rapidly and confidentially , as [two business men meeting in [the street]2061-the street and always in a hurry]3015-two business men meeting in the street and always in a hurry might try and compress into a few minutes , between two handshakes , a lot of personal news . [He]0-i seemed to wish to combine conviction that [he]0-i was very anxious to tell [Kreisler]190-kreisler all about [himself]0-i and ( by [his]0-i hurried air ) paralysis of [the other]2449-the other ’s intention to have an explanation . “[0-i] [I]0-i am glad [you]0-i are going to paint [the Countess Wort]229-countess wort . [I]0-i congratulate [you]0-i , [Mr. Volker]230-volker ! [I]0-i am in a hurry . Good day . ” [Kreisler]190-kreisler turned and walked towards [the Atelier Juan Soler]3018-the atelier juan soler . For no reason ( except that it was impossible ) [he]190-kreisler could not get money from [Volker]230-volker . It was as though that money would not be real money at all . Supposing [he]190-kreisler got it ; the first place [he]190-kreisler tried to pass it [the man]2084-the man would say , “[0-i] This is not money . ” As for taking [him]190-kreisler to task , [his]230-volker red , correct face made it impossible ; it had suddenly become a lesson and exercise that it would be ridiculous to repeat . [He]230-volker was not [a schoolboy]3020-a schoolboy . [Volker]230-volker walked away ruffled . [He]230-volker was mortified that , by apprehension of a scene , [he]230-volker had been so friendly . [The old Otto]190-kreisler had scored . [He]190-kreisler , [Volker]230-volker , had humiliated [himself]190-kreisler needlessly , for it was evident [Kreisler]190-kreisler ’s manner had been misinterpreted by [him]190-kreisler . [Kreisler]190-kreisler had not intended going to [Soler]220-juan soler ’s that day . Yet [there]2057-there [he]190-kreisler was , presumably got [there]2057-there now to avoid [Ernst Volker]191-volker . [He]190-kreisler saw [himself]190-kreisler starting up from [the Berne]2321-the berne a quarter of an hour before , steaming away in pursuit of [a skulking friend]3024-a skulking friend — impetus of angry thought carrying [him]190-kreisler far beyond [his]190-kreisler destination ; then [Volker]191-volker comes along and runs [him]190-kreisler into [the painting school]3025-the painting school . [He]190-kreisler compared [himself]190-kreisler to one of those little steam toys that go straight ahead without stopping ; that [any one]397-any one can take up and send puffing away in the opposite direction . The irresponsible , resigned , and listless air signified whimsical expectancy . [Some other figure]3031-some other figure would rise up , no doubt , and turn [him]190-kreisler streetwards again ? [A member of the race which has learnt to sleep standing up posed on the throne]3032-a member of the race which has learnt to sleep standing up posed on the throne . The clock struck . [He]190-kreisler had been considering a fat back and especially a parting carried half - way down the back of the head . Why should not [its owner]3039-its owner , and [gardener]3040-gardener , [he]190-kreisler had reflected , continue it the whole distance down , dividing [his]190-kreisler head in half with a line of white scalp ? [This man]416-this man now turned on [him]190-kreisler sudden , unsurprised , placid eyes . Had [he]416-this man eyes , as well as a parting , at the back of [his]416-this man head ? [Kreisler]190-kreisler felt on the verge of courteous discussion as to whether that parting should or should not be gone on with till it reached the neck . Three had struck . [He]190-kreisler left and returned to [the neighbourhood of [the Berne]9-the berne]3042-the neighbourhood of the berne by the same and longest route , as though to efface in some way [his]190-kreisler previous foolish journey . Every three or four hours vague hope recurred of the delayed letter , like hunger recurring at the hour of meals . [He]190-kreisler went up to the loge of [[his]190-kreisler house]3043-his house and knocked . “[0-i] Il n’y a rien pour vous ! ” Four hours remained . [The German party]3044-the german party was to meet at [Fraulein Lipmann]209-fraulein lipmann ’s after dinner . [[Otto]190-kreisler ’s compatriots at [the Berne]9-the berne]3045-otto ’s compatriots at the berne were sober and thoughtful , with discipline in [their]3045-otto ’s compatriots at the berne idleness . [Their]3045-otto ’s compatriots at the berne monthly moneys flowed and ebbed , it was to be supposed , small regular tides frothing monotonously in form of beer . This rather desolate place of chatter , papers , and airy , speculative business had the charm of absence of gusto . [Kreisler]190-kreisler was ingrainedly antiquated , purer German . [He]190-kreisler had experienced suddenly home - sickness , that often overtakes voluntary exiles at the turn of [their]3045-otto ’s compatriots at the berne life — [his]190-kreisler being , not for [Germany]4-germany , exactly , but for the romantic , stiff ideals of [the German student of [his]190-kreisler generation]3046-the german student of his generation . It was a home - sickness for [[his]190-kreisler early self]3047-his early self . Like knack of riding [a bicycle]3048-a bicycle or anything learnt in youth , this character was easily assumed . [He]190-kreisler was gradually discovering the foundations of [his]190-kreisler personality . Many previous moods and phases of [his]190-kreisler ' nature were mounting to the surface . Arrived in front of [the Cafe Berne]2527-the cafe berne , [he]190-kreisler stood for fifteen minutes looking up and down [the street]2061-the street , at [the pavement]3012-the pavement , [his]190-kreisler watch , [the passers - by]3052-the passers - by . Then [he]190-kreisler chose [the billiard - room]3053-the billiard - room door to avoid the principal one , where [he]190-kreisler usually entered . All the ugly familiarity of [this place]388-this place , [he]190-kreisler hated with methodic , deliberate hatred ; taking things one by one , as it were , [persons]3055-persons and objects . "[2208-the garçon] [The garçon]2208-the garçon ’s spasmodic running about was like a gnat ’s energy over stagnation . Passing from [the billiard - room]3053-the billiard - room to [a gangway with several tables]755-a gangway with several tables , [his]756-his dull , exasperated eye fell on something it did not understand . How could it be expected to understand ? It was an eye and it stuck . It was simple , though . [It]757-it was amazed and did not understand . [Anastasya]216-anastasya . Set in the heart of this ennui , it arrested the mind like a brick wall [some carter]758-some carter drowsed on [[his]758-some carter wagon]759-his wagon . Stopping dead , [Kreisler]190-kreisler stared stupidly . [Anastasya]216-anastasya was sitting there with [Soltyk]206-soltyk . With [Soltyk]206-soltyk ! [He]190-kreisler seemed about to speak to [them]760-them — [they]760-them , at least , were under this impression . Quite naturally [he]190-kreisler was about to do this , like [a child]499-a child . As though in intense abstraction , [he]190-kreisler fixed [his]190-kreisler eyes on [them]760-them . Then [he]190-kreisler took a step towards [them]760-them , possibly with the idea of sitting down beside [them]760-them . [He]190-kreisler was in a great hurry to get past [the two people sitting there]764-the two people sitting there . [Same table on terrasse]766-same table on terrasse as an hour before . But [Kreisler]190-kreisler seemed sitting on air , or one of those wooden whirling platforms in the fetes . The garçon , with a femininely pink , virile face which , in a spirit of fun , [he]190-kreisler kept constantly wooden and solemn except when , having taken [your]767-your order , [he]190-kreisler winked or smiled — came up hastily . “ Was [wünschen Sie]231-wünschen sie ? ”[190-kreisler] [he]190-kreisler asked , wiping the table with a serviette . [He]190-kreisler had learned a few words of German from [the customers]768-the customers . [Kreisler]190-kreisler ’s thoughts dashed and stunned [themselves]771-themselves against [this waiter]772-this waiter . [His]190-kreisler mind stood stock - still for several minutes . This pink wooden face paralysed everything . As [its owner]3039-its owner thought “ [the young man]3056-the young man ”[3039-its owner] was having a joke with [him]190-kreisler , it became still more humorously wooden . The more wooden it became , the more paralysed became [Kreisler]190-kreisler ’s intelligence . [He]190-kreisler stared at [him]772-this waiter more and more oddly , till [the garçon]2208-the garçon was forced to laugh . As a matter of fact , [Kreisler]190-kreisler mentally was steadying [himself]190-kreisler on this hard personality . As [he]190-kreisler had appeared to walk deliberately with hot intention to [his]190-kreisler seat , so [he]190-kreisler seemed gazing deliberately at [the waiter]3003-the waiter and choosing [his]190-kreisler drink . Then the dam gave way . [He]190-kreisler hated this familiar face ; [his]190-kreisler thought smashed and buffeted it . Such commercial modicum of astute good nature was too much . It was kindness that only [equilibrium]776-equilibrium could ignore . The expression of [his]190-kreisler own face became distorted . [The garçon]2208-the garçon fixed [him]190-kreisler with [his]190-kreisler eye and took a step back , with dog - like doubt , behind the next table . [Anastasya]216-anastasya had smiled in a very encouraging way as [he]190-kreisler passed . This had offended [him]190-kreisler extremely . [Soltyk]206-soltyk — [Anastasya]216-anastasya ; [Soltyk]206-soltyk — [Anastasya]216-anastasya . That was a bad coupling ! [His]190-kreisler sort of persecution mania seized [him]190-kreisler by the throat . This had done it ! [Soltyk]206-soltyk , who had got hold of [Volker]191-volker and was the something that had interfered between [that borrowable quantity]778-that borrowable quantity and [himself]190-kreisler , occupied a position not unsimilar to [[his]190-kreisler stepmother]779-his stepmother . [Volker]191-volker and [[his]191-volker father]402-his father , who had kept [him]191-volker suspended in idleness , and who now both were withdrawing or had withdrawn like diminishing jets of water , did not attract the full force of [his]191-volker indolent , tragic grumpiness . Behind [Ernst]191-volker and [[his]191-volker parent]781-his parent [Soltyk]206-soltyk and [[his]191-volker stepmother]779-his stepmother stood . A certain lonely and comic ego [all people]783-all people carry about with [them]783-all people , who is always dumb except when [they]783-all people get drunk or become demented . [It]784-i then talks , never sincerely , but in a sort of representative , pungent way . This ego in [Kreisler]190-kreisler ’s case would not have been shameless and cynical if it had begun to grumble about [Volker]191-volker . [It]784-i would have said , “ [Hang that little Ernst]191-volker ! [I]784-i come to [Paris]1-paris , [I]784-i am ashamed to say , partly for [him]191-volker . [The pig - dog Soltyk]3059-the pig - dog soltyk is sitting there ! ”[784-i] In any case [his]191-volker vanity too was hurt . [Anastasya]216-anastasya now provided [him]191-volker with an acceptable platform from which [his]191-volker vexation might spring at [Soltyk]206-soltyk . There was no money or [insignificant male liaison]785-insignificant male liaison to stuff [him]191-volker down into grumpiness . “ [Das Weib]217-dem weib ”[785-insignificant male liaison] was there . All was in order for unbounded inflammation . [He]191-volker wanted to bury [his]191-volker fear in [her]786-her hot hair ; [he]191-volker wanted to kiss [her]786-her lips as [he]191-volker had never kissed [any woman]787-any woman ’s ; all the things [he]191-volker wanted — ! But what would [Soltyk]206-soltyk be doing about it ? [He]191-volker had met [her]786-her alone , and that was all right and not impossible with a world made by [their]788-their solitary meeting in [the restaurant]2772-the restaurant . [He]191-volker had lived with [her]786-her instinctively in [this solitary world of [he]191-volker and [she]786-her]790-this solitary world of he and she . It was quite changed at present . [Soltyk]206-soltyk had got into it . [Soltyk]206-soltyk , by implication , brought [a host of others]791-a host of others , even if [he]206-soltyk did not mean that [he]206-soltyk was [a definite rival there [himself]206-soltyk]792-a definite rival there himself . Sneers and ridicule , oceans of sneers directed at [himself]191-volker , more than [ten thousand men]793-ten thousand men could have discharged , [he]191-volker felt , certainly were inundating [her]786-her ear . [[His]191-volker stepmother]779-his stepmother - fiancée , other tales , were being retailed . Everything that would conceivably prejudice [Anastasya]216-anastasya , or would not , [he]191-volker accepted as already retailed . There [he]191-volker sat , like [a coward]795-a coward . [He]191-volker was furious at [their]796-their distant insulting equanimity . A breath of violent excitement struck [him]191-volker , coming from within . [He]191-volker stirred dully beneath it . [She]786-her was there ; [he]191-volker had only put a thin partition between [them]796-their . [His]191-volker heart beat slowly and ponderously . “ On hearing what [the swine Soltyk]206-soltyk has to say [she]786-her will remember [my]191-volker conduct in [the restaurant]2772-the restaurant and [my]191-volker appearance . [She]786-her will make it all fit in . And , by God , it does fit in ! [Himmel]197-himmel ! [Himmel]197-himmel ! there ’s nothing to be done ! Anything [I]191-volker did , every movement , would only be filling out the figure [my]191-volker ass - tricks have cut for [her]786-her ! ”[191-volker] [He]191-volker was as conscious of the interior , which [he]191-volker could not see from [[his]191-volker place on [the street]2061-the street]797-his place on the street , as though , passing through , [he]191-volker had just found the walls , tables , chairs , painted bright scarlet . [He]191-volker felt [he]191-volker had left a wake of seething agitation in [his]191-volker passage of the café Passing [the two people inside]799-the two people inside there had been the affair of a moment , not yet grasped . This experience , apparently of the past , was still going on . The sense ’s picture , even , was not yet complete . New facts , details , were added every moment . [He]191-volker was still passing [Anastasya]216-anastasya and [Soltyk]206-soltyk . [He]191-volker sat on , trembling , at the door . There were other exits . [She]800-she might be gone . But [he]191-volker forgot about [them]801-them . How [he]191-volker had worried [himself]191-volker about the pawned suit . [Fate]172-fate had directed [him]191-volker there to [the café]2708-the café to save [him]191-volker the trouble of further racking [his]191-volker brains about it . Should [he]191-volker leave [Paris]1-paris ? But [he]191-volker was mutinous . The occurrence of this idea filled [him]191-volker with suspicions . The fit was over ; reaction had set in . [He]191-volker was eyeing [himself]191-volker obliquely in the looking - glass behind [his]191-volker head . [He]191-volker almost jumped away at two voices beside [him]191-volker , and the thrilling sound of a dress ; it was as though [some one]619-some one had spoken with [his]619-some one own voice . It seemed all round [him]191-volker , attacking [him]191-volker . The thin , ordinary brushing of a skirt was like the low breathing of a hidden animal to [a man in [the forest]805-the forest]804-a man in the forest . [He]191-volker felt [they]806-they were coming to speak to [him]191-volker — just as [they]806-they had thought that [he]191-volker was . The nerves on that side of [his]191-volker head twitched as though shrinking from a touch . [They]806-they were crossing [the terrasse]807-the terrasse to [the street]2061-the street . [His]191-volker heart beat a slow march . [Her]809-her image there had become used . The reality , in its lightning correction of this , dug into [his]191-volker mind . There once more [the real figure]810-the real figure had its separate and foreign life . [He]191-volker was disagreeably struck by a certain air of depression and cheerlessness in [the two figures before [him]191-volker]811-the two figures before him . This one thing that should have been pleasant , displeased [him]191-volker . [He]191-volker was angry as though [she]809-her had been shamming melancholy . [They]806-they were not talking , the best proof of familiarity . A strange figure occurred to [him]191-volker ; [he]191-volker felt like [a man , with all organs , bones , tissues complete , but made of cheap perishable stuff , who could only live for a day and then die of use]812-a man , with all organs , bones , tissues complete , but made of cheap perishable stuff , who could only live for a day and then die of use . This image , reality now before [him]191-volker , had drawn out all [his]191-volker energy , like a distinct being nourished by [him]191-volker . The image , intact in [his]191-volker mind , had returned [him]191-volker more or less the vigour spent . [Her]809-her listlessness seemed a complement of the weakness [he]191-volker now felt . Energy was ebbing away from both . [He]191-volker stared with bloodshot eyes . Then [he]191-volker got up and began walking after [her]809-her . [Soltyk]206-soltyk , on hearing steps , turned round ; but [he]191-volker made no remark to [Anastasya]216-anastasya . [They]806-they crossed [the street]2061-the street and got into [a passing tram]814-a passing tram . [Otto Kreisler]190-kreisler went back to [the café]2708-the café It was like returning to [some hall]816-some hall where there had been a banquet to find empty chairs , empty bottles , and disorder . The vacant seats around seemed to have been lately vacated . Then there was the sensation of being left behind . [The Café Berne]481-the café berne was [a solitary and antediluvian place]818-a solitary and antediluvian place . Everything began to thrust itself upon [him]191-volker — [the people]2221-the people , [street]820-street , insignificant incidents — as though this indifferent life of facts , in the vanishing of the life of the imagination , had now become important , being the only thing left . Common life seemed rushing in and claiming [him]191-volker , and emphasizing [his]191-volker defeat and the new condition thus inaugurated . [He]191-volker went to [[Lejeune]222-lejeune ’s]821-lejeune ’s for dinner . During the whole day [he]191-volker had been in feverish hurry , constantly seeing time narrowing in upon [him]191-volker . Now [he]191-volker had a sensation of intolerable leisure . The useless ennui of [his]191-volker life presented itself to [him]191-volker for the thousandth time , but now clearly . This fact seemed to have been waiting with irritating calm , as though to say , “ As soon as [you]191-volker can give [me]191-volker [your]191-volker attention ? — Well , what are [you]191-volker going to do with [me]191-volker ? ”[191-volker] For [he]191-volker had compromised [himself]191-volker irretrievably . [He]191-volker knew that sooner or later [he]191-volker must marry and settle down with this stony fact , multiply its image . Things had gone too far . And how about [[his]191-volker father]402-his father ? What was that letter going to contain ? [[His]191-volker father]402-his father had got a certain amount of pleasure out of [him]191-volker . [Otto]190-kreisler had satisfied in [him]191-volker in turn the desire of possession ( that objects such as [your]824-your watch , [[your]824-your house]825-your house , which could equally well belong to [anybody]2075-anybody , do not satisfy ) , of authority ( that [servants]827-servants do not satisfy ) , of self - complacency ( that self does not ): had been to [him]191-volker , later , a kind of living cinematograph and travel - book combined ; and , finally , had inadvertently lured with [his]191-volker youth [a handsome young woman]828-a handsome young woman into the paternal net . But [he]191-volker knew that [he]191-volker could procure no further satisfaction to [this satiated parent]829-this satiated parent . [He]191-volker could be henceforth [a source only of irritation and expense]830-a source only of irritation and expense . After dinner [he]191-volker walked along [the boulevard]426-the boulevard . The dark made [him]191-volker adventurous . [He]191-volker peered into cafés as [he]191-volker passed . [He]191-volker noticed it was already eight . Supposing [he]191-volker should meet [some of [the women on the way to [Fraulein Lipmann ’s]209-fraulein lipmann]833-the women on the way to fraulein lipmann ’s]832-some of the women on the way to fraulein lipmann ’s ? [He]191-volker made a movement as though to turn down [a side - street]834-a side - street and hide [himself]191-volker at thought of possible confrontation . Next moment [he]191-volker was walking on obstinately in the direction of [the Lipmann ’s house]835-the lipmann ’s house . [His]191-volker weakness drew [him]191-volker on , back into [the vortex]836-the vortex . Anything , death , and annihilation , was better than going back into that terrible colourless mood . [[His]191-volker room]2290-his room , [the cafe]2705-the cafe , waited for [him]191-volker like [executioners]839-executioners . [He]191-volker had escaped from [it]2290-his room for a time . Late agitations had given [him]191-volker temporary freedom , to which [he]191-volker was now committed . Dressed as [he]191-volker was , extremely untidy , [he]191-volker would go to [[Fraulein Lipmann]209-fraulein lipmann ’s flat]840-fraulein lipmann ’s flat . Only humiliation [he]191-volker knew awaited [him]191-volker in that direction . If [Anastasya]216-anastasya were [there]2057-there ( [he]191-volker would have it that [she]842-her would be found wherever [he]191-volker least would care to see [her]842-her ) then anything might happen . But [he]191-volker wanted to suffer still more by [her]842-her ; physically , as it were , under [her]842-her eyes . That would be a relief from present suffering . [He]191-volker must look in [her]842-her eyes ; [he]191-volker must excite in [her]842-her the maximum of contempt and dislike . [He]191-volker wanted to be in [her]842-her presence again , with full consciousness that [his]191-volker mechanical idyll was barred by [Fate]172-fate . Not strong enough to leave things as they were , [he]191-volker could not go away with this incomplete and , physically , uncertain picture behind [him]191-volker . It was as though [a man]2077-a man had lost a prize and wanted written and stamped statement that [he]2077-a man had lost it . [He]191-volker wished to shame [her]842-her . If [he]191-volker did not directly insult [her]842-her , [he]191-volker would at least insult [her]842-her by thrusting [himself]191-volker on [her]842-her . Then , at height of [her]842-her disgust , [he]191-volker would pretend again to make advances . As to the rest of [the party]2180-the party , a sour glee possessed [him]191-volker at thought of [their]845-their state by the time [he]191-volker had done with [them]845-their . [He]191-volker already saw [their]845-their faces in fancy when [he]191-volker should ring [their]845-their bell and present [himself]191-volker , old morning suit , collar none too clean , dusty boots . All this self - humiliation and suffering [he]191-volker was preparing for [himself]191-volker was wedded with the thought of retaliation . [He]191-volker saw a curious scene proceeding beneath a desk in class . [The boy next to [him]190-kreisler]846-the boy next to him had jabbed [[his]846-the boy next to him neighbour]2806-his neighbour in the hand with a penknife . [Some of [the others]904-the others]903-some of the others were conscious of something unusual in [his]190-kreisler presence besides [his]190-kreisler dress and the disorder even of that . Social facts , abstracted in this manner , appealed to the mind with the strangeness of masks , each sense , isolated , being like a mask on another . [Anastasya]216-anastasya appeared . [She]906-her came out of that social flutter astonishingly inapposite , like a mask come to life . The little fanfare of welcome continued . [She]906-her was much more outrageous than [Kreisler]190-kreisler could ever hope to be : bespangled and accoutred like [a princess of [the household of [Peter]238-peter]908-the household of peter the Great jangling and rumbling like [a savage showman through abashed capitals]909-a savage showman through abashed capitals]907-a princess of the household of peter the great jangling and rumbling like a savage showman through abashed capitals . [The Bonnington Club]63-the bonnington club was not far off and [they]916-they had decided to walk , as the night was fine . It was about half - past nine when [they]916-they started . What was the matter with [Bertha]177-bertha ? Many things , of course . Among old general things was a state hardly of harmony with [the Lipmann]209-fraulein lipmann circle . [She]177-bertha was rather suspect for [her]177-bertha too obvious handsomeness . It was felt that [she]177-bertha was perhaps a little too interested in [the world]2089-the world . [She]177-bertha was not quite obedient enough in spirit to [the Lipmann]209-fraulein lipmann . Even nuances of disrespect had been observed . Then [Tarr]122-tarr had turned up nearly at the commencement of [her]177-bertha incorporation . This was an eternal thorn in [their]933-their sides , and chronic source of difficulty . [Tarr]122-tarr was uncompromisingly absent from all [their]933-their gatherings , and bowed to [them]933-their , when met in [the street]2061-the street , as it seemed to [them]933-their , narquoisement , derisively , even . [He]122-tarr had been excommunicated long ago , most loudly by [Fraulein Van Bencke]241-fraulein van bencke . “ Homme sensuel ! ”[177-bertha] [she]177-bertha had called [him]190-kreisler . [She]177-bertha averred [she]177-bertha had caught [his]190-kreisler eye resting too intently on [her]177-bertha well - filled - out bosom . “ Homme égoiste ! ”[177-bertha] ( this referred to [his]190-kreisler treatment of [Bertha]177-bertha , supposed and otherwise ) . [Tarr]122-tarr considered that [these ladies]2685-these ladies were partly induced to continue [their]2685-these ladies friendship for [Bertha]177-bertha in a hope of disgusting [her]177-bertha of [her]177-bertha fiancé , or doing as much harm to both as possible . [Bertha]177-bertha alternately went to [them]2685-these ladies a little for sympathy , and defied [them]2685-these ladies with a display of [his]190-kreisler opinions . [Kreisler]190-kreisler had lately been spoken about uncharitably among [them]2685-these ladies . By inevitable analogy [he]190-kreisler had , in [her]177-bertha mind , been pushed into the same boat with [Tarr]122-tarr . [She]177-bertha always felt [herself]177-bertha a little without the circle . So , [Bertha]177-bertha , still in this unusual way clinging to [him]190-kreisler ( although [she]177-bertha had ceased plying [him]190-kreisler with conversation ) [they]2685-these ladies proceeded along [the solitary backwater of Boulevard in which [they]2685-these ladies were]936-the solitary backwater of boulevard in which they were . [They]2685-these ladies tramped on under the small uniform trees [Paris]1-paris is planted with , a tame and insipid obsession . [Kreisler]190-kreisler ignored [his]190-kreisler surroundings . [He]190-kreisler was transporting [himself]190-kreisler , self - guarded Siberian exile , from [one cheerless place]939-one cheerless place to another . To [Bertha Nature]177-bertha still had the usual florid note . The immediate impression caused by the moonlight was implicated with a thousand former impressions : [she]177-bertha did not discriminate . It was the moon illumination of several love affairs . [Kreisler]190-kreisler , more restless , renovated [his]190-kreisler susceptibility every three years or so . The moonlight for [him]190-kreisler was hardly nine months old',,and belonged to [Paris]1-paris , where there was no romance . For [Bertha]177-bertha the darkened trees rustled with the delicious and tragic suggestions of the passing of time and lapse of life . The black unlighted windows of [the tall houses]940-the tall houses held within , for [her]177-bertha , breathless and passionate forms , engulfed in intense eternities of darkness and whispers . Or a lighted one , in its contrast to the bland light of the moon , so near , suggested something infinitely distant . There was something fatal in the rapid never - stopping succession of [their]2685-these ladies footsteps — loud , deliberate , continual noise . [[Her]177-bertha strange companion]941-her strange companion ’s dreamy roughness , this romantic enigma of the evening , suddenly captured [her]177-bertha fancy . The machine and indiscriminate side of [her]177-bertha awoke . [She]177-bertha took [his]190-kreisler hand — rapid , soft and humble , [she]177-bertha struck the deep German chord , vibrating rudimentarily in the midst of [his]190-kreisler cynicism . “ [You]190-kreisler are suffering ! Can not [I]177-bertha ? ”[177-bertha] [Kreisler]190-kreisler began tickling the palm of [her]177-bertha hand slightly . When [he]190-kreisler saw it interrupted [her]177-bertha words , [he]190-kreisler stopped , holding [her]177-bertha hand solemnly as though it had been a fish slipped there for some unknown reason . [The garçons]3089-the garçons have not yet got it ! ”[190-kreisler] [Kreisler]190-kreisler did not distinguish [Bertha]177-bertha much from the others . Now [he]190-kreisler accepted [her]943-her present genuineness , but ill - temperedly substituted complete boredom for mistrust , and at the same time would use this little episode to embellish [his]190-kreisler programme . [He]190-kreisler had not been able to shake [her]943-her off : it was astonishing how [she]943-her had stuck : and here [she]943-her still was ; [he]190-kreisler was not even sure yet that [he]190-kreisler had the best of it . [She]943-her succumbed to the instinct to “ give up , ”[190-kreisler] and even sententiously “ destroy . ”[943-her] [She]943-her remembered [her]943-her resolve — a double one of sacrifice — and pressed [her]943-her lips , shaking and wettened , to [his]190-kreisler . This was not the way [she]943-her had wished : but , [God]135-god ! what did it matter ? It mattered so little , anything , and above all [she]943-her ! This was what [she]943-her had wanted to do , and now [she]943-her had done it ! The “ resolve ”[943-her] was a simple one . [He]190-kreisler wished to be released , did not want [her]943-her , was irked , not so much by [their]945-their formal engagement as by [his]190-kreisler liking for [her]943-her ( this kept [him]190-kreisler , [she]943-her thought [she]943-her discerned ) . A stone hung round [his]190-kreisler neck , [he]190-kreisler fretted the whole time , and it would always be so . Good . This [she]943-her understood . Then [she]943-her would release [him]190-kreisler . And [he]190-kreisler arose not too unnaturally . This idea had been germinating while [Tarr]122-tarr was still with [her]943-her that morning . Should [Tarr]122-tarr wish it undone , it could easily be so . The smudge on [Kreisler]190-kreisler ’s back was a guarantee , and did the trick in more ways than [he]190-kreisler had counted on . [Kreisler]190-kreisler ever since the scene on [the boulevard]426-the boulevard had felt a reckless gaiety and irresponsibility , which [he]190-kreisler did not conceal . With [his]190-kreisler abashed English hostess [he]190-kreisler carried on a strange conversation full of indirect references to the “ stately edifice in the [Hue de Rennes]66-hue de rennes . ”[190-kreisler] [He]190-kreisler had spoken of it to [Bertha]177-bertha : “ [That stately edifice in [the Rue de Rennes]64-the rue de rennes]3093-that stately edifice in the rue de rennes — but of course [you]177-bertha do n’t know it ! ”[190-kreisler] With smiling German ceremoniousness , with ingenious circumlocutions , [he]190-kreisler bent down to [[his]190-kreisler hostess]866-his hostess ’s nervously smiling face and poured into [her]866-his hostess startled ear symbols and images of pawnshops , usury , three gold balls , “ pious mountains , ”[190-kreisler] “ smokkin ”[190-kreisler] or “ frac ”[190-kreisler] suits , etc . , which [he]190-kreisler seemed a little to confuse , overwhelmed [her]866-his hostess with a serious terminology , all in a dialect calculated to bewilder [the most acute philologist]1015-the most acute philologist . “ Yes , it is interesting , ”[866-his hostess] [she]866-his hostess said with strained conviction . “ Is n’t it ? ”[866-his hostess] [Kreisler]190-kreisler replied .
